Counter Strike: Global Offensive is the worst game I have ever played. It contains a community that is almost as toxic as League of Legends, a marketplace that pressures players into purchasing virtual skins for upwards of thousands of dollars, and a competitive community that can only be described as a mess. However, even with all of these glaring downsides, I still managed to sink weeks of my life into this heap of garbage. Do I regret it? Absolutely. Will I continue wasting my otherwise enjoyable life on this nonsensical activity? Absolutely.

Hi guys,

What can I say? This game is epic, yes it's getting old but oh man I love the simplicity yet the highly skilled players you encounter online here. Scout (SSG:08) is one of my favorite weapon as well as the AK-47 for its one-tap headshot potential. I spent a lot of hours playing and having fun with this game I don't have enough it is really addictive and I enjoy watching ESL One and other Major tournaments with pro players it's really a pleasure cause it's a teamplay game

If you have'nt tried yet and you like reflex gaming and shooting, this game is for you!
